lexUnit.name: beg.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: ask for (something) earnestly or humbly

sentence.text: Please do n't tell me we 're totally wrong for each other , Luce begged silently , I already know .
Move out of the village , Ashley begged silently .
` Oh , Fabio , please ! " begged Rosa .
` Please do n't tell anyone in the village that you 've seen me , " begged the girl .
` No , Frank , do n't give them brandy , " begged Bathsheba , ` it will only do them harm ! "
` Please do n't plant trees which shed thick leaves in autumn , " begged the engineers .
She begged pardon at once for -- being so free as to presume I will be read but then , ma'am , you must blame yourself for encouraging in me that letter-writing soul .
